Property.name: DisableDuringStory
Property.HelpText: Only load the DLCs when current character's story is 100% complete.

Property.name: DLCMode
Property.HelpText: Select how the DLC content should load in the game.

Property.name: DLCSingle
Property.HelpText: Select the DLC to be loaded in Single mode.

Property.name: MenuVoiceThing
Property.HelpText: Select the character whose voice will be used in menus. True Random will switch characters every second.

Property.name: SegaVoiceLanguage
Property.HelpText: Select the language to use for the voice on the SEGA screen, or disable the voice like in the vanilla game.

Property.name: HDTimer
Property.HelpText: Use a timer based on generic textures instead of the debug font.

Property.name: SuperSonicRacing
Property.HelpText: Play the Super Sonic Racing music for all characters when they go through the Samba GP gate. When false, the music changes only for Sonic.

Property.name: SonicTrack
Property.HelpText: Select the Twinkle Circuit track to load when Sonic goes through the Samba GP gate. Note: the names of unused tracks aren't official.
